posts.post_title: Want to TRADE down PSA 5 T206 Shag OM to SGC 40 or 50
posts.post_content:
Posted By: B O'Brien
Hello all,

I am looking to trade my PSA 5 Shag Old Mill for a SGC 40 or 50 with an Old Mill back to better go with the rest of my guys.  We can make up the difference in cash or with a SGC 40-50 HOFer that I don't have, or a Black Cap Chase with one of the follwing backs.

16. American Beauty - Series 460 - Factory 42 - District 4 - State NC
21. American Beauty (without frame) - Series 350 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
23. Cycle - Series 350 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
25. Sweet Caporal - Series 350-460 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
34. Sweet Caporal - Series 350 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA

Here are some scans:
Thanks,
Bob
